description:
#### 
## Adding a new Institution. 

Please fill in the information below.

label: Issue Type
description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.

label: Acronym
description: A short acronym from which your institution can be identified with. \n\nNote: This name must be unique across all organisations and cannot be changed once data is published with it.

label: Full name of the organisation
description: Please provide a full name for the organisation to perform checks and help users understand the acronym.

label: ROR
description:
To help maintain traceability we are making use of the research organisation registry (ROR). This allows us to generate a unique id for each institution and extract a detailed log of history.

To get your organisation ROR number visit ror.org and search. If your organisation is not registered please register it first.

If an open request exists on ROR but no number issued yet paste the reference URL here instead.

label: Other Notes
description: Generally this section will remain empty but additional notes (e.g. source_id submissions using this institution) can be referenced here.
